HediffDef.label: stump leg
HediffDef.description: A fleshy boneless mass of skin and muscle, serving as a sort of awkward meaty peg leg.\n\nThe flesh lump has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s stump has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!
